segments.text: I'd like to check in , PLS .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Awfully sorry , sir . There are no rooms available now .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But I â€™ Ve reserved a room the day before yesterday .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sorry , may I have your name ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Pls wait a minute , let me check . Excuse me , but I can't seem to find your name on our list . Are you sure you have a reservation for tonight ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Of course , I did it myself .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am terribly sorry . There must have been some mistakes . Let me check it again . Oh , yes , there is a name listed as Tommy Bush . It must be the fault of the clerk who registered your name . I apologize .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: According to the records , your reservation is for a single room with shower and air conditioners for two nights . The room rate will be 110 dollars per night , including 10 % tax and 4 % service charge . Is this right ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , that's right . I'd like to pay my bill by credit card .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: May I make a copy of your card ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ok , now could you fill out this registration form ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Your room number is 707 . Here is your key . The bellhop will help you carry the suitcases to your room . Have a nice evening !
segments.speaker: S2
